data.message: Trying to register on the website. With connect with facebook. It recognises that i have an account. But when you click on it nothing happens. Waste of time.

replies.message: Hi Scott, we've become aware of a website error when signing into the promotional website via Facebook. We're currently working to get this fixed, sorry for any inconvenience caused. In the meantime, please log out if you're logged/signed in. Select the destination first and then log in when prompted on the destination page. Hope this helps
